arts.ttl: Regis Le Bris explains his big tactical switch to help Sunderland beat Middlesbrough
arts.sum: Ahead of the game, Sunderland's French head coach had - like Preston North End boss Paul Heckingbottom last weekend - spoken about how he had a good idea of what to expect from Boro. "We needed to solve many problems during the game, especially our left side because they overload this side.

arts.ttl: 'Bitterly disappointed' Carrick sets Middlesbrough players a challenge after Sunderland loss
arts.sum: A bitterly disappointed Michael Carrick challenged his Middlesbrough players to start finding a way as they lost the Wear-Tees derby 1-0 against Sunderland. We’ve got to face that challenge and find ways to break teams down."

arts.ttl: Michael Carrick left angered by 'big' referee decision as Middlesbrough lose to Sunderland
arts.sum: Michael Carrick was left questioning how Sunderland weren't down to ten men very early in the Wear-Tees derby - with the Boro boss feeling Trai Hume should have seen red for a challenge of Emmanuel Latte Lath. Twice we've been here with me as manager and there's been red cards which have had a massive impact on the game.

arts.ttl: Teenager Rigg's backheel steers Sunderland past Middlesbrough
arts.sum: Chris Rigg wrote himself into Wear-Tees derby folklore as the 17-year-old's outrageous backheeled winner secured Sunderland a 1-0 victory over Sky Bet Championship rivals Middlesbrough.

arts.ttl: Sunderland spring a tactical surprise as familiar problems cost Middlesbrough in derby defeat
arts.sum: Michael Carrick's side were only able to have one shot on target in the whole 90 minutes, however, as their misfiring attack continued struggle to find ways to break down a low-block in what turned into a really poor day for Boro. Some sign of life for Boro at least to take into the second half, Carrick was under pressure at the break to find a way to solve a familiar puzzle that his side so often struggle against.

arts.ttl: Sunderland beat Middlesbrough in derby thanks to 17-year-old Chris Rigg’s strike
arts.sum: .The teenager’s cheeky finish was enough to clinch three points.

arts.ttl: 'How cool is that?!' | Teenager Rigg's AUDACIOUS backheel gives Sunderland lead
arts.sum: Chris Rigg puts Sunderland into the lead against Middlesbrough with an audacious backheel goal.

arts.ttl: What Middlesbrough can learn from Sunderland's Plymouth loss and Regis Le Bris' excellent start
arts.sum: With the experienced Alan Browne expected to miss the Boro game through injury, the midfield battle appears to be an area Carrick's side could look to exploit, with Ben continuing: "The international break definitely killed our momentum. While Carrick will no doubt hope to learn something about their vulnerabilities from that defeat, he will also, understandably, prepare his Boro side to play what would be considered the best version of Sunderland - the side that enjoyed their best start to a new season in almost a century after winning four from four while conceding only one goal.

arts.ttl: Saturday's Championship predictions including Sunderland vs. Middlesbrough
arts.sum: Sports Mole provides score predictions and previews for all of today's Championship fixtures, including Sunderland vs. Middlesbrough.

arts.ttl: Wayne Rooney chat planned as Michael Carrick prepares Middlesbrough for Sunderland
arts.sum: Michael Carrick was planning to speak with his former Manchester United team-mate Wayne Rooney as he prepared his Middlesbrough side for their trip to Sunderland. "Sometimes we’ll have a lot of the ball and we’ve got to try and break teams down, other times we’ll attack from deep and be a bit more in transition because you’re defending a bit more.
